com.tagtraum.ffsampledsp

Class FFAudioFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat
      • com.tagtraum.ffsampledsp.FFAudioFormat

  • public class FFAudioFormat
extends AudioFormat
    FFSampledSP's AudioFormat adding a PROVIDER property and a special constructor to be called from FFAudioFileFormat.
    Author:
    Hendrik Schreiber

      • FFSAMPLEDSP

        public static final String FFSAMPLEDSP
        Special property value for PROVIDER, marking FFSampledSP audio formats. This allows us to take some shortcuts.
        See Also:
        PROVIDER, FFCodecInputStream, Constant Field Values
